name: The Barrel Invasion
description:
Explosions! There are dosens of them here. They are the sense of the game. The more score you get the more spectacular explosions you can see. And the game will be chainging up to the score of 3500. To understand game's rules look at the pictures on the walls. Monsters in shooters usually distract you from barrel extermination, but no one will stop you now! Draw your masterpiece with fire and smoke!

Details:

Platform: PC, Windows.

Tested under: Win7, Win8.1, Win10.
